comments.body: WTF????? Is it test or piece of sh#t? Why the hell we wait for cluster propagation before we call fix_cluster????????

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +50,54 @@    wait_for_cluster_propagation
    assert_equal "xyz" [$cluster get aga]
    fix_cluster $nodefrom(addr)
    assert_equal "xyz" [$cluster get aga]
}
